name: Delicious Cured Pork Dry Hotpot
desc: A dish fried over a great flame. The rendered fat from the fried ham layers the side dishes perfectly, and the flavors have long permeated the whole dish. Its shine alone is enough to whet one's appetite, and every bite is sure to evoke memories of house, home, and celebration in anyone from Liyue.

value.text: Increases all party members' CRIT Rate by 20% for 300s. In Co-Op Mode, this effect only applies to your own character(s).

customize.name: Recipe: Cured Pork Dry Hotpot
customize.desc: A detailed step-by-step recipe for making Cured Pork Dry Hotpot.

customize.name: Ham
customize.desc: Smoked leg meat. Even the thinnest slice is packed full of flavor.

customize.name: Matsutake
customize.desc: A rare fungus that generally grows on or near pine trees. Its delicate aroma gives away its location.

customize.name: Snapdragon
customize.desc: Can be eaten once cooked. As a spice, it can bring wonderful flavor to dishes.

customize.name: Pepper
customize.desc: Peppery. Cuts through oily flavors and excites the taste buds. Goes best on meat.

customize.name: Cured Pork Dry Hotpot
customize.desc: A dish fried over a great flame. Matsutake and Ham have been sliced up, stir-fried, and garnished with some spicy condiments. The flavor of the Ham is a match for the Matsutake's crispness, and the combination grows ever lovelier and more addictive as you chew. The heat-conducting wok also serves to keep it piping hot for long periods.

customize.name: Suspicious Cured Pork Dry Hotpot
customize.desc: A dish fried over a great flame. The quality of the pork is fair enough, but it is far too salty. Have a piece of this, and you will taste nothing but brine in your mouth no matter how many Snapdragons or Matsutake mushrooms you consume.
